001
002package com.commercetools.api.models;
003
004import java.util.Map;
005import java.util.Optional;
006import java.util.function.Function;
007
008import javax.annotation.Nullable;
009
010/**
011 * @param <T> the type of the map value
012 */
013public class MapAccessor<T> {
014    private final Map<String, T> map;
015
016    public MapAccessor(Map<String, T> map) {
017        this.map = map;
018    }
019
020    @Nullable
021    public <U> U get(final String key, Function<T, U> mapFn) {
022        return Optional.ofNullable(map.get(key)).map(mapFn).orElse(null);
023    }
024
025    @Nullable
026    public T get(final String key) {
027        return map.get(key);
028    }
029}
